title: Death threats & Toxicity Nidalee (Poll)
body: Hi Riot, can we get a ban hammer on this guy please? This guy was also threatening to rape little girls as well. Just totally toxicity. How can we address this behavior?

replies.body: but i liked it :( no report pls

Your source of evidence is that screenshot that you have right there to the Riot support service. From what I am assuming the action Riot will take is either a suspension or chat restriction implemented on the players account.
